startup.title: Startup
startup.description: Automatically start Coco when you login

windowMode.title: Window Mode
windowMode.description: Set how the window appears when opened.

ai.title: Selection Toolbar
ai.description: Show selection toolbar after text selection

about.slogan: Search, Connect, Collaborate—All in one place

defaultStartupWindow.title: Default Startup Window
defaultStartupWindow.description: Set whether Coco opens in Search or Chat mode.

defaultContentForSearchWindow.title: Default Content for Search Window
defaultContentForSearchWindow.description: Set what shows by default in Search mode.

defaultContentForChatWindow.title: Default Content for Chat Window
defaultContentForChatWindow.description: Set what shows by default in Chat mode.

modifierKey.title: Modifier Key
modifierKey.description: Set the primary modifier key for custom shortcuts.

modeSwitch.title: Mode Switch
modeSwitch.description: Shortcut to toggle between Search and Chat modes.

returnToInput.title: Return to Input
returnToInput.description: Shortcut to go back to the input area in both Search and Chat modes.

voiceInput.title: Voice Input
voiceInput.description: Shortcut to activate voice input function in Search mode.

addImage.title: Add Image
addImage.description: Shortcut to quickly add images in Search mode.

selectLlmModel.title: Select LLM Model
selectLlmModel.description: Shortcut to select the desired LLM model in Chat mode.

addFile.title: Add File
addFile.description: Shortcut to add files conveniently in Chat mode.

deepThinking.title: Deep Thinking
deepThinking.description: Shortcut to activate Deep Thinking Mode in chat mode.

internetSearch.title: Internet Search
internetSearch.description: Shortcut button to enable networking search in chat mode.

internetSearchScope.title: Internet Search Scope
internetSearchScope.description: Shortcut to open the networking search scope menu in chat mode.

mcpSearch.title: MCP Search
mcpSearch.description: Shortcut button to enable MCP search in chat mode.

mcpSearchScope.title: MCP Search Scope
mcpSearchScope.description: Shortcut to open the MCP search scope menu in chat mode.

historicalRecords.title: Conversation History
historicalRecords.description: Shortcut to view past conversation history in chat mode.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Shortcut to view AI assistant list in chat mode.

newSession.title: New Conversation
newSession.description: Shortcut to start a new conversation in chat mode.

fixedWindow.title: Fixed Window
fixedWindow.description: Shortcut to keep the Coco window always on top of other windows.

serviceList.title: Service Panel
serviceList.description: Shortcut to open the service panel in chat mode.

external.title: Detach Window
external.description: Shortcut to open the current conversation as an independent window in chat mode.

hints.isSystem: The shortcut key "{{0}}" is reserved by the system. Please choose a different key.
hints.isUse: The shortcut key "{{0}}" is already used by "{{1}}". Please choose a different key.

aiOverview.title: AI Overview
aiOverview.description: Shortcut button to enable AI Overview in chat mode.

normalOpacity.title: Active Window Opacity
normalOpacity.description: Adjust the opacity of the Coco AI window while in use. The range is from 10% to 100%, where 100% means fully opaque, and lower values increase transparency, allowing the underlying content to show through.

blurOpacity.title: Pinned Window Dimness Setting
blurOpacity.description: Adjusts the opacity level of the Coco AI window when it’s pinned and not in focus. Set a value between 10% and 100%, where 100% means fully opaque (no dimming), and lower values increase transparency, allowing underlying content to show through.

snapshotUpdate.title: Snapshot Updates
snapshotUpdate.description: Get early access to new features. May be unstable.

connectionTimeout.title: Connection Timeout
connectionTimeout.description: Retries the connection if no response is received within this time. Default: 120s.

queryTimeout.title: Query Timeout
queryTimeout.description: Terminates the query if no search results are returned within this time. Default: 500ms.

searchDelay.title: Search Delay
searchDelay.description: Delay before search is triggered after user stops typing. Default: 300 ms.

allowSelfSignature.title: Allow Self-Signed Certificates
allowSelfSignature.description: Allow connections to servers using self-signed certificates. Enable only if you trust the source.

localSearchResultWeight.title: Local Search Result Weight
localSearchResultWeight.description: Adjusts how local results (files, extensions, commands, etc.) are ranked. Higher values place them closer to the top.

compactModeAutoCollapseDelay.title: Compact Mode Auto-Collapse Delay
compactModeAutoCollapseDelay.description: Adds a delay before collapsing in Compact Mode to avoid sudden size changes when typing or clearing input. Default: 10s.

hints.importFailed: No valid extension found in the selected folder. Please check the folder structure.
hints.extensionAlreadyImported: Extension already imported. Please remove it first.
hints.platformIncompatibleExtension: This extension is incompatible with your OS.
hints.appIncompatibleExtension: Installation failed! Incompatible with your Coco App version. Please update and retry.
hints.incompatible: Extension cannot run on the current version. Please upgrade Coco App.
hints.duplicateSubExtensionId: Duplicate ID, sub-extension with ID '{{id}}' already exists.
hints.fieldsNotAllowed: Fields '{{fields}}' are not allowed for extensions of type '{{ty}}'.
hints.fieldsNotAllowedForSubExtension: Fields '{{fields}}' are not allowed for sub-extensions.
hints.subExtensionHasMoreSupportedPlatforms: It supports platforms {{extra_platforms}} that are not supported by the main extension.
hints.fieldRequired: An extension of type '{{ty}}' should have field '{{field}}' set.

details.searchScopeDescription: Directories added here will be searched for applications and preference panes.
details.rebuildIndexDescription: Rebuild the index to search the latest application list.
details.name: Name

hints.reindexSuccess: Index rebuilt successfully. The latest application list is now updated.
hints.reindexFailed: Failed to rebuild the index. Please try again later.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: A calculator you can quickly invoke in the search bar, supporting basic math operations.

quickAiAccess.description: Quick AI access allows you to start a conversation immediately from the search box using the Tab key.

aiOverview.description: AI Overview generates concise summaries based on your search results, helping you quickly grasp key information without reading every document.

aiOverviewTrigger.title: AI Overview Trigger
aiOverviewTrigger.description: AI Overview will be triggered only when all of the following conditions are met.(search results are sourced from Coco Server's result statistics)

hints.pathDuplication: Path "{{0}}" is already in search scope.
hints.pathIncluded: Path "{{0}}" is already covered by another search directory.

fileSearch.description: Search for files and folders on your computer.

list.failures: Partial results returned due to service failures.

input.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server

uploadFileHints.tooltip: Support screenshots, upload files, up to {{0}}, single file up to {{1}}.

chat.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server
chat.greetings: Hi! I’m Coco, nice to meet you. I can help answer your questions by tapping into the internet and your data sources. How can I assist you today?
chat.timedout: Request timed out. Please try again later.
chat.error: Request error. Please try again later.
chat.connect_tip: To start a conversation, please log in to your account.

sessionFile.title: Files in the conversation
sessionFile.description: Only the selected files will participate in the current conversation

connect.title: Connecting to Your Coco-Server
connect.description: Running your own private instance of coco-server ensures complete control over your data, keeping it secure and accessible only within your environment. Enjoy enhanced privacy, better performance, and seamless integration with your internal systems.

cloud.manualCopyLink: If the link did not open automatically, please copy and paste it into your browser manually

update.title: New update available for Coco AI.
update.optional_description: New update available for Coco AI.
update.force_description2: Please install the latest version to continue.

error.message: Sorry, there is an error in your Coco App. Please contact the administrator.

deleteDialog.title: Uninstall
deleteDialog.description: This will remove all the data and commands associated with this extension.

hints.tourist: Tourist mode, login to unlock the full experience.
hints.login: Please log in to your account to start.
hints.pleaseLogin: Please log in to your account to start.
